alert.note: Alert for Dunn; McKenzie (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 10:07PM CST until December 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST/11 AM MST/ MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations up to 2 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of west and south central North Dakota. * WHEN...Until Noon CST/11 AM MST/ Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dangerously cold wind chills are possible Monday morning, continuing through much of the week. This could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
